targets.query: select count("count") from (SELECT count(value) FROM "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" where time > now() - 11s group by host)
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'telemetry' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'event' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.device.delivered.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT'  group by host ) where $timeFilter
SELECT mean(value) FROM "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" WHERE $timeFilter and type = 'telemetry' and  tenant = '$TENANT' GROUP BY host, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.m1_rate" WHERE $timeFilter and type = 'event' and  tenant = '$TENANT' GROUP BY host, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "meter.hono.commands.device.delivered.m1_rate" WHERE $timeFilter and  tenant = '$TENANT' GROUP BY host, time($__interval) fill(null)
select sum(*) from (select last(value) from "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.count" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'telemetry' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "counter.hono.messaging.messages.discarded.count" where tenant = 'DEFAULT_TENANT' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.messaging.messages.processed.count" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'event' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "counter.hono.messaging.messages.undeliverable.count" where tenant = 'DEFAULT_TENANT' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.device.delivered.count" where tenant = '$TENANT' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.response.delivered.count" where tenant = '$TENANT' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select count("count") from (SELECT count(value) FROM "meter.hono.mqtt.messages.processed.count" where time > now() - 11s group by host)
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.mqtt.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'telemetry' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.mqtt.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'event' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select count("count") from (SELECT count(value) FROM "meter.hono.http.messages.processed.count" where time > now() - 11s group by host)
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.http.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'telemetry' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.http.messages.processed.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and type = 'event' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.device.delivered.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and protocol='mqtt' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.ttd.expired.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and protocol='mqtt' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.response.delivered.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and protocol='mqtt' group by host ) where $timeFilter
select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.device.delivered.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and protocol='http' group by host ) where $timeFilter

panels.description: Total number of ttd expiries and no commands were received

targets.query: select sum(*) from ( select last(value) from "meter.hono.commands.ttd.expired.m1_rate" where tenant = '$TENANT' and protocol='http' group by host ) where $timeFilter

panels.title: Total TTD Expiries  Per Sec (Ø/min)
